availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Crawford (Mason County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant. Married to Amanda Silvy Crawford in Lewis County, Kentucky, on December 26, 1850. Father of Frances A. Crawford and Andrew Crawford. Merchant in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 139.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Orangeburg, p. 486B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, 1807-1852, Film #000344051, p. 110 of 284 of microfilm.
